4276.verse: لَهُۥ|To Him|65|72|977$مَا|(belong) whatever|142|156|262$فِى|(is) in|58|72|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|129|351$وَمَا|and whatever|111|125|46$فِى|(is) in|58|72|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۖ|the earth,|92|99|100$وَهُوَ|and He|66|154|305$ٱلْعَلِىُّ|(is) the Most High,|144|319|2283$ٱلْعَظِيمُ|the Most Great.|125|212|2284$

4277.verse: تَكَادُ|Almost|64|70|11313$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتُ|the heavens|115|128|3277$يَتَفَطَّرْنَ|break up|96|109|11314$مِن|from|50|63|53$فَوْقِهِنَّ‌ۚ|above them,|103|116|15342$وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ|and the Angels|119|132|1834$يُسَبِّحُونَ|glorify|101|107|11749$بِحَمْدِ|(the) praise|98|110|9865$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord|113|137|54$وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَ|and ask for forgiveness|174|198|15073$لِمَن|for those|80|104|1356$فِى|on|48|72|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۗ|the earth.|92|104|100$أَلَآ|Unquestionably,|125|133|105$إِنَّ|indeed,|68|84|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah,|56|72|184$هُوَ|He|48|64|298$ٱلْغَفُورُ|(is) the Oft-Forgiving,|166|182|8348$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|148|398$

4278.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|133|42$ٱتَّخَذُواْ|take|84|112|4600$مِن دُونِهِۦٓ|besides Him|116|144|4463$أَوْلِيَآءَ|protectors,|94|122|2754$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|81|123$حَفِيظٌ|(is) a Guardian|117|131|8558$عَلَيْهِمْ|over them,|92|123|22$وَمَآ|and not|71|132|46$أَنتَ|you|58|119|341$عَلَيْهِم|(are) over them|125|186|22$بِوَكِيلٍ|a manager.|94|125|5694$

4279.verse: وَكَذَٲلِكَ|And thus|91|102|1273$أَوْحَيْنَآ|We have revealed|139|161|4640$إِلَيْكَ|to you|63|85|45$قُرْءَانًا|a Quran|80|102|9459$عَرَبِيًّا|(in) Arabic,|94|116|9492$لِّتُنذِرَ|that you may warn|146|157|6243$أُمَّ|(the) mother|105|115|5828$ٱلْقُرَىٰ|(of) the towns,|122|142|5829$وَمَنْ|and whoever|105|125|1012$حَوْلَهَا|(is) around it,|111|131|5830$وَتُنذِرَ|and warn|81|101|11330$يَوْمَ|(of the) Day|102|112|1057$ٱلْجَمْعِ|(of) Assembly,|116|129|15343$لَا|(there is) no|103|128|30$رَيْبَ|doubt|67|92|31$فِيهِ‌ۚ|in it.|50|76|32$فَرِيقٌ|A party|72|98|729$فِى|(will be) in|89|114|89$ٱلْجَنَّةِ|Paradise|75|88|778$وَفَرِيقٌ|and a party|97|200|15344$فِى|in|48|255|89$ٱلسَّعِيرِ|the Blazing Fire.|126|230|11967$

4280.verse: وَلَوْ|And if|58|70|179$شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah willed,|99|122|180$لَجَعَلَهُمْ|He could have made them|192|215|15345$أُمَّةً|a community|104|127|1174$وَٲحِدَةً|one,|78|101|1853$وَلَـٰكِن|but|78|90|108$يُدْخِلُ|He admits|85|98|12002$مَن|whom|58|84|76$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|94|867$فِى|in (to)|62|88|89$رَحْمَتِهِۦ‌ۚ|His Mercy.|98|124|6470$وَٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ|And the wrongdoers,|158|184|15346$مَا|not|42|55|262$لَهُم|for them|76|115|98$مِّن|any|50|128|53$وَلِىٍّ|protector|82|160|1006$وَلَا|and not|71|149|25$نَصِيرٍ|any helper.|94|133|1007$

4275.verse: Thus has He revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and to those before you - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

4276.verse: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and He is the Most High, the Most Great.

4277.verse: The heavens almost break from above them, and the angels exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord and ask forgiveness for those on earth. Unquestionably, it is Allah who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.

4278.verse: And those who take as allies other than Him - Allah is [yet] Guardian over them; and you, [O Muhammad], are not over them a manager.

4279.verse: And thus We have revealed to you an Arabic Qur'an that you may warn the Mother of Cities [Makkah] and those around it and warn of the Day of Assembly, about which there is no doubt. A party will be in Paradise and a party in the Blaze.

4280.verse: And if Allah willed, He could have made them [of] one religion, but He admits whom He wills into His mercy. And the wrongdoers have not any protector or helper.

4281.verse: Or have they taken protectors [or allies] besides him? But Allah - He is the Protector, and He gives life to the dead, and He is over all things competent.

4282.verse: And in anything over which you disagree - its ruling is [to be referred] to Allah. [Say], "That is Allah, my Lord; upon Him I have relied, and to Him I turn back."
